original: yan lag gi don yang brjod par bya ste /

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: 'di dag gis ni mchod pa rnam pa gsum bstan te /

analyzed: phyag bya ba ni lus kyi dang / bstod pa ni ngag gi yin la /

analyzed: 'o na sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams 'dod pa'i lha yin mod /

original: ji ltar na bla ma rang gi 'dod pa dam pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bla ma rang gi 'dod pa dam pa yin zhe na /

original: 'dir bla ma 'dod pa'i lha yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bla ma 'dod pa'i lha yin te /

original: lhag par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ram sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ram sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba de lta'i mgon la bsam bcas pas //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba de lta'i mgon la bsam bcas pas //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de bas na bla ma la mchod pa kho na grol ba'i byed pa po yin no //

original: de ltar bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas nas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas nas ci bya zhe na /
translated: Having thus paid homage at the guru's lotus feet, what is to be done?

original: dri med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dri med ces bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: dri med ni rnam par dag cing skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: 'on kyang 'di dag rang gi yid kyi 'dod pa kho nas brtags pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di dag rang gi yid kyi 'dod pa kho nas brtags pa ma yin nam zhe na /

analyzed: de ma yin pa ni rgyud mang las gsungs pa zhes bya bas bshad de /

original: rgyud ni rgyun chags pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun chags pa yin la /

original: de yang rgyu la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rgyu la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste /

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called cause, effect, and means.

original: de la rigs kyi dbye ba ni rgyu'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de la rigs kyi dbye ba ni rgyu'i rgyud de /

original: rigs can gyi sems can rnams rab tu mang ba nyid kyi phyir rgyun chags par brjod do //
analyzed: rigs can gyi sems can rnams rab tu mang ba nyid kyi phyir rgyun chags par brjod do //

original: rigs kyi dbye ba las 'bras bur gyur ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbye ba ni 'bras bu'i rgyud de /
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba las 'bras bur gyur ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbye ba ni 'bras bu'i rgyud de /
translated: The division of the effect of the division of lineage is the resultant continuum,

analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub pa'i ched du sngas dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams ni thabs kyi rgyud de /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub pa'i ched du sngas dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams ni thabs kyi rgyud de /
translated: The conditions such as mantra, seal, and mandala, for the sake of accomplishing the effect from the cause, are the means continuum,

original: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i thabs chen po rnams kyi cho ga dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i thabs chen po rnams kyi cho ga dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the rites of the great means such as mantra, seal, etc. are immeasurable.

original: de yang gtso bo nyid kyi dbye bas cho ga mang po ste /
analyzed: de yang gtso bo nyid kyi dbye bas cho ga mang po ste /
translated: Moreover, there are many rituals due to the divisions of the principal one itself.

original: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud ces bya ba de dag thams cad du 'brel pa rnams so //üîΩrgyud mang po de dag tu gsungs shing bshad @13a * //
analyzed: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud ces bya ba de dag thams cad du 'brel pa rnams so // rgyud mang po de dag tu gsungs shing bshad @13a * //
translated: The rituals of action, conduct, yoga, highest yoga, and unexcelled yoga tantras are all related to that.

original: pa ni rgyud mang las gsungs pa'o //üîΩ'o na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis de dang de las gsungs pa'i phyir 'di brtsams pa la dgos pa med do zhes bya bar dogs pa la /
analyzed: pa ni rgyud mang las gsungs pa'o // 'o na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis de dang de las gsungs pa'i phyir 'di brtsams pa la dgos pa med do zhes bya bar dogs pa la /
translated: The explanation of what is taught in those many tantras is the explanation of the many tantras.üîΩNow, since the Lord himself taught this and that, there is no need to compose this.

original: mdor bsdus nas bshad par gsungs te /
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas bshad par gsungs te /
translated: In response to that doubt, it is said that it is taught in brief.

original: rgyud mang po lta bas 'jigs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan pa'i phyir rgyud mang po las /
analyzed: rgyud mang po lta bas 'jigs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan pa'i phyir rgyud mang po las /
translated: For the sake of benefiting those beings who are afraid of the many tantras, the many tantras

analyzed: lus pa med par phyung nas gcig tu bsdus te 'dir mngon par brjod pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: are extracted without remainder, gathered into one, and expressed here.

original: 'di zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i bla ma bsten pa rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i bla ma bsten pa rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of relying on the desired guru.

analyzed: de ltar 'di zhes pa ni de nyan ba la skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir mnyan par gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus, in order to connect those sentient beings who are fortunate to listen to this, he says, ‚ÄúListen!‚Äù

original: mnyan par gyis ni rna ba spags la'o //
analyzed: mnyan par gyis ni rna ba spags la'o //
translated: Listen means pay attention with your ears.

original: de zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of listening?

analyzed: gus pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: gus pa ni 'dir nyan pa'i tshul te /

original: rnam pa gzhan du khas sbubs pa dang mi gtsang ba dang rdol ba'i bum pa la sogs pa rnams su char bab pa lta bur don dang bral ba nyid yin pas de'i gtam mi bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du khas sbubs pa dang mi gtsang ba dang rdol ba'i bum pa la sogs pa rnams su char bab pa lta bur don dang bral ba nyid yin pas de'i gtam mi bya ba'i phyir ro //

original: spang zhing bsnyen bkur bya ba min //
analyzed: spang zhing bsnyen bkur bya ba min //
translated: They are always to be avoided by sentient beings, and should not be served.

original: de rnams la ni phyag mi bya //
analyzed: de rnams la ni phyag mi bya //
translated: They should not be bowed to,

original: kun du myang bar yang mi bya //
analyzed: kun du myang bar yang mi bya //
translated: nor should one ever taste

original: zhes so // de bas na bsam pa ma dag pas ming tsam gyi slob dpon ni legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de bas na bsam pa ma dag pas ming tsam gyi slob dpon ni legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, those who desire what is good should completely avoid the mere nominal master who is impure in his intentions.

original: gal te bsam pa ma dag pa'i slob ma'am bla ma lhan cig pa'i 'brel pa byas pa de'i tshe gnyis ka la cir 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te bsam pa ma dag pa'i slob ma'am bla ma lhan cig pa'i 'brel pa byas pa de'i tshe gnyis ka la cir 'gyur //
translated: If one has made a connection with an impure disciple or master, what happens to both of them?

original: spyod pa ma yin pa las dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyod pa ma yin pa las dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: They fall from their commitments due to their non-conduct.

original: dam tshig nyams par gyur na de la cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dam tshig nyams par gyur na de la cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens to them when they fall from their commitments?üîΩIt is said:

original: mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúThey are equal, and their commitments are destroyed.‚Äù

original: mtshungs pa ni mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ni mnyam pa'o //
translated: Equal means the same.

original: dam tshig ni slob dpon gyis 'gong bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni slob dpon gyis 'gong bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Commitments are not to be transgressed by the master.

original: de dam tshig kyang yin la mtshungs pa yang yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa dam tshig ste mtshungs pa nyid ni gnyis ka yang 'di'i bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dam tshig kyang yin la mtshungs pa yang yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa dam tshig ste mtshungs pa nyid ni gnyis ka yang 'di'i bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is both a pledge and equal, it is an equal pledge.

original: rnam pa gnyis po de yang bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis po de yang bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: The two kinds are to be guarded and to be eaten.

original: de la bsrung bar bya ba yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de la bsrung bar bya ba yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Among them, that which is to be guarded is twofold:

original: blang bar bya ba dang / dor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: blang bar bya ba dang / dor bar bya ba'o //
translated: that which is to be taken up and that which is to be rejected.

original: de la blang bar bya ba ni dge ba'i rang bzhin rnams dang / dor bar bya ba ni mi dge ba'i rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: de la blang bar bya ba ni dge ba'i rang bzhin rnams dang / dor bar bya ba ni mi dge ba'i rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: Among them, that which is to be taken up is the nature of virtue, and that which is to be rejected is the nature of nonvirtue.

original: blang bar bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: blang bar bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That which is to be taken up is threefold:

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi'o //
translated: of body, speech, and mind.

original: de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa ni lus kyi'o //
analyzed: de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa ni lus kyi'o //
translated: Among them, killing and so forth are of the body.

original: brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa ni ngag gi'o //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa ni ngag gi'o //
translated: Lying and so forth are of speech.

original: brnab sems la sogs pa ni yid kyi'o //
analyzed: brnab sems la sogs pa ni yid kyi'o //
translated: Covetousness and so forth are of the mind.

original: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The pledge to be eaten is also twofold:

original: rtag tu nye par spyad pa dang / skabs su nye bar spyad pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu nye par spyad pa dang / skabs su nye bar spyad pa'o //
translated: The pledge of equality is the pledge to always practice and to practice occasionally.

original: de la rtag tu nye bar spyad pa ni sgron ma lda la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la rtag tu nye bar spyad pa ni sgron ma lda la sogs pa'o //
translated: The always practice is the practice of the lamp, and so on.

original: skabs su nye bar spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skabs su nye bar spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The occasionally practice is the practice of the vajra-holder, and so on.

original: yang na mtshungs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba la mtshungs pa ni 'dra pa ste /
analyzed: yang na mtshungs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba la mtshungs pa ni 'dra pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, the pledge of equality is the pledge to be equal.

original: @19a * // mnyam pa dang mthun pa zhes bya bar gcig pa'i don to //
analyzed: @19a * // mnyam pa dang mthun pa zhes bya bar gcig pa'i don to //
translated: Equality means similarity, sameness, and concordance, and has the meaning of oneness.

original: dam tshig gi don tshig rnam par sbyar ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dam tshig gi don tshig rnam par sbyar ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the term samaya is as above.

original: mtshungs pa'i dam tshig de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i dam tshig de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: This pledge of equality is twofold:

original: bla ma'i bya ba dang / slob ma'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i bya ba dang / slob ma'i bya ba'o //
translated: the duties of the master and the duties of the disciple.

original: de la slob ma'i bya ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang nod pa'o //
analyzed: de la slob ma'i bya ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang nod pa'o //
translated: The duties of the disciple are to receive initiation according to the rite,

original: de nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ba yin gyi gang ngas 'di bya dgos so //
analyzed: de nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ba yin gyi gang ngas 'di bya dgos so //
translated: and from that point on, to be a vajra-holder of that master, and to do whatever the master commands.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'di dag kyang khyod kyis dbang bskur ba ma thob cing dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'di dag kyang khyod kyis dbang bskur ba ma thob cing dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya ste /
translated: You should not speak of these mantras, mudras, mandalas, and so forth to those who have not received empowerment and have not seen the mandala.

original: ya nga ba ma spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmyal ba la sogs par 'gyur ta re zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par byed pa ni bla ma'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: ya nga ba ma spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmyal ba la sogs par 'gyur ta re zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par byed pa ni bla ma'i bya ba'o //
translated: These mantras, seals, mandalas, and so forth should not be spoken of to those who have not received empowerment and have not seen the mandala, saying, Do not speak of these, lest you fall into the hells and so forth by performing the rites of the season without having abandoned fear.

original: bla ma la sogs pa mtho ba rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de slob ma'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: bla ma la sogs pa mtho ba rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de slob ma'i bya ba'o //
translated: The master's duties are to say such things as, The proper conduct of those who are exalted, such as the master, is the disciple's duties.

original: mtshungs pa'i dam tshig nyams pa ni 'khyams pa'o //üîΩmtshungs pa'i dam tshig nyams pa de yang skyon te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i dam tshig nyams pa ni 'khyams pa'o // mtshungs pa'i dam tshig nyams pa de yang skyon te /
translated: The transgression of the same commitments is wandering.

original: ltung ba dang mi dge ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ltung ba dang mi dge ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That transgression of the same commitments is also a fault, meaning a downfall and nonvirtue.

original: hi ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
analyzed: hi ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
translated: Hi means for what reason?

original: su'i skyon du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: su'i skyon du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Whose fault is it?

original: slob dpon dang ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: slob dpon dang ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, of the master and the disciple.

original: slob dpon dang slob ma ni dpon slob ste de dag gi'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang slob ma ni dpon slob ste de dag gi'o //
translated: Master and disciple are master and disciple, and they are of that.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the intention:

original: dam tshig nyams na slob dpon gyi dngos grub nyams pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon yin la /
analyzed: dam tshig nyams na slob dpon gyi dngos grub nyams pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon yin la /
translated: If the commitments are impaired, it is a fault because it is a cause for the impairment of the master's spiritual powers.

original: slob ma'i yang 'dir lus dang sems gzir ba'i nye bar 'tshe ba skyed par byed pa'i phyir dang / phyi ma la yang ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i phyir na skyon chen po ste /
analyzed: slob ma'i yang 'dir lus dang sems gzir ba'i nye bar 'tshe ba skyed par byed pa'i phyir dang / phyi ma la yang ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i phyir na skyon chen po ste /
translated: And it is a great fault for the disciple here because it generates the harm of the body and mind being oppressed, and because it generates the suffering of the miserable realms in the future.

original: de bzhin du dam pa ma yin pa'i kun du spyod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dam pa ma yin pa'i kun du spyod pa yang yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is also a non-virtuous conduct.

original: slob ma'i skyon bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slob ma'i skyon bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the faults of the disciple,

original: brtse ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: brtse ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says without affection, etc.

original: bla mas slob mar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bla mas slob mar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not be a disciple of the guru.

original: zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: zhes 'brel lo //
translated: This is the connection.

original: bla ma ni bshad zin la /
analyzed: bla ma ni bshad zin la /
translated: The guru has been explained.

original: bslab pa la slob pas na slob ma ste slob bu'o //
analyzed: bslab pa la slob pas na slob ma ste slob bu'o //
translated: The disciple is one who is learning the precepts, a student.

original: de la mi bya ba mi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de la mi bya ba mi sgrub pa'o //
translated: With regard to that, not doing is not accomplishing.

original: bla ma ji lta bus she na /
analyzed: bla ma ji lta bus she na /
translated: What kind of guru?

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba la blo ni blo gros dri ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba la blo ni blo gros dri ma med pa yin la /
translated: The wise one is one who has a stainless mind.

original: de 'di la yod pa'i phyir blo ldan no //
analyzed: de 'di la yod pa'i phyir blo ldan no //
translated: He is wise because he has that.

original: slob ma'i khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: slob ma'i khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the disciple like?

original: brtse ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: brtse ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He is said to be without compassion, etc.

original: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las 'don par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi snying rje ni brtse ba yin @19b la ;
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las 'don par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi snying rje ni brtse ba yin @19b la ;
translated: Compassion is the desire to remove suffering and the cause of suffering.

original: de las 'das pa gang gis na brtse ba med pa de ni brtse ba med do //
analyzed: de las 'das pa gang gis na brtse ba med pa de ni brtse ba med do //
translated: He is without compassion because he is beyond that.

original: khro ba ni khong khro zhing 'khrug pa ste mi bzod par gyur pas 'phral du gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i don te de ni khro ba'o //
analyzed: khro ba ni khong khro zhing 'khrug pa ste mi bzod par gyur pas 'phral du gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i don te de ni khro ba'o //
translated: Anger is the state of being angry and upset, the state of being intolerant, the state of doing harm immediately.üîΩHe is angry because of that.

original: gdug pa ni sems rtsub mo ste /
analyzed: gdug pa ni sems rtsub mo ste /
translated: Cruelty is a harsh mind.

original: brtse ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brtse ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He is without compassion because of that.

original: khengs pa ni cung zad kyis dregs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khengs pa ni cung zad kyis dregs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Arrogance is the state of being conceited by a little.üîΩHe is arrogant because of that.

original: chags pa ni pha rol gyi rdzas 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni pha rol gyi rdzas 'dod pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the desire for another's property.

original: ma bsdams pa ni g-yo zhing mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsdams pa ni g-yo zhing mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o //
translated: Unrestrained is unsteady and not in equipoise.

original: bkag par gyur pa ni bdag nyid mchog yin no zhes bdag nyid bsngags shing gzhan la smod pa ste /
analyzed: bkag par gyur pa ni bdag nyid mchog yin no zhes bdag nyid bsngags shing gzhan la smod pa ste /
translated: Blocked is praising oneself and disparaging others, thinking ‚ÄúI am supreme.‚Äù

original: tshul khrims 'di la bdag mchog tu gyur pa'o zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'di la bdag mchog tu gyur pa'o zhes bya bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this morality, I am supreme.‚ÄùüîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / mchog yin zhes ni rab smra ba'i //
analyzed: gsungs pa / mchog yin zhes ni rab smra ba'i //
translated: ‚ÄúI am supreme‚Äù is the one who

original: yon tan rnams ni sbyin par byed //
analyzed: yon tan rnams ni sbyin par byed //
translated: gives the qualities.

original: ces so // dang yig ni kun bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces so // dang yig ni kun bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúand‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúall.‚Äù

original: dang yig las 'di lta bu dag ni bla mar yang mi bya'o zhes ni gzhan dag go //
analyzed: dang yig las 'di lta bu dag ni bla mar yang mi bya'o zhes ni gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that from the word ‚Äúand,‚Äù ‚Äúthese are not to be taken as supreme.‚Äù

original: bla ma'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bla ma'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the nature of the guru,

original: brtan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: brtan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äústeadfast,‚Äù and so forth.

original: bsam pa dang blos shin tu zin pa'i phyir bstan pa ste blo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa dang blos shin tu zin pa'i phyir bstan pa ste blo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Because of being well-taken by thought and mind, steadfast is intelligent.

original: dul ba ni 'dul ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: dul ba ni 'dul ba bzhin du'o //
translated: Subdued is like being disciplined.

original: blo gros ni rnam par dpyod pa ste shes rab yin la de 'di la yod pa'i phyir blo gros ldan pa ste rnam par dpyad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blo gros ni rnam par dpyod pa ste shes rab yin la de 'di la yod pa'i phyir blo gros ldan pa ste rnam par dpyad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Intelligence is discernment, which is wisdom. Since he has that, he is intelligent, which means he is discerning.

original: bzod pa ni bzod par gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bzod pa ni bzod par gyur ba ste /
translated: Patience is the state of being patient.

original: de yang sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold: patience in withstanding suffering, patience in tolerating the harm of others, and patience in being certain about the Dharma.

original: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi bzod pa gang la yod pa de ni bzod ldan no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi bzod pa gang la yod pa de ni bzod ldan no //
translated: He who has that kind of patience is patient.

original: drang ba ni 'phags pa'i sa la rab tu bzhugs pa'i phyir gya gyu med pa'i lta ba can te /üîΩgya gyu ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'o //
analyzed: drang ba ni 'phags pa'i sa la rab tu bzhugs pa'i phyir gya gyu med pa'i lta ba can te / gya gyu ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'o //
translated: He is straightforward because he is established in the noble stages, and so he has an honest view.üîΩDishonesty is a sinful view.

original: gya gyu ci yin sdig can lta //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gya gyu ci yin sdig can lta //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Dishonesty is a sinful view.

original: g-yo skyu med pa ni rang gi skyon sgrib pa'i thabs kun du 'dzin pa'i sems kyi gya gyu nyid g-yo yin pas de la zhugs pa ni g-yo ste /
analyzed: g-yo skyu med pa ni rang gi skyon sgrib pa'i thabs kun du 'dzin pa'i sems kyi gya gyu nyid g-yo yin pas de la zhugs pa ni g-yo ste /
translated: The meaning of his mind is free from deceit and guile is as follows: Deceit is the crookedness of mind that grasps at the means to conceal one's faults. One who is engaged in that is deceitful.

original: g-yo dang bral zhing g-yo med la gya gyu med pa'i sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: g-yo dang bral zhing g-yo med la gya gyu med pa'i sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is free from deceit and guile, and his mind is free from crookedness.

original: sngags rgyud kyi ni rab sbyor shes te sngags ni shis pa ste /
analyzed: sngags rgyud kyi ni rab sbyor shes te sngags ni shis pa ste /
translated: He knows the application of mantra and tantra means that mantra is auspicious.

original: de kho na nyid kyi don yid la byas pas 'gro ba skyob pa'i phyir na sngags so //üîΩde yang phreng ba'i sngags dang @20a * //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi don yid la byas pas 'gro ba skyob pa'i phyir na sngags so // de yang phreng ba'i sngags dang @20a * //
translated: Because it protects beings by bringing to mind the meaning of reality, it is a mantra.üîΩMoreover, it is threefold: garland mantras,

original: btus pa'i sngags dang snying po'i sngags zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: btus pa'i sngags dang snying po'i sngags zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: collected mantras, and essence mantras.

original: rgyud ni phyir bzlog gi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ni phyir bzlog gi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
translated: Tantra is the wheel of averting, and so on.

original: sngags dang rgyud ni sngags rgyud de //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud ni sngags rgyud de //
translated: Mantra and tantra are mantra tantra.

original: de rnams kyi rab sbyor ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rab sbyor ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las te /
translated: Their application is the activities of pacification, and so on.

original: de shes pa'i phyir sngags rgyud kyi ni rab sbyor shes pa'o //
analyzed: de shes pa'i phyir sngags rgyud kyi ni rab sbyor shes pa'o //
translated: Because he knows that, he knows the application of mantra and tantra.

original: snying rjer ldan pa ni sems can thams cad la snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o //üîΩbstan bcos mkhas pa ni 'chos pa'i phyir bstan bcos te /
analyzed: snying rjer ldan pa ni sems can thams cad la snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o // bstan bcos mkhas pa ni 'chos pa'i phyir bstan bcos te /
translated: Compassionate means endowed with compassion for all sentient beings.üîΩSkilled in treatises means treatises are for the purpose of composition.

original: gzhung du spel ba yin la //
analyzed: gzhung du spel ba yin la //
translated: They are composed in a text.

original: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
translated: Moreover, in brief, there are twelve types:

original: chos dang / rtog ge dang / don dang / sgra dang / gar dang ; ro bcud dang / yongs su brtag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gso ba dang / rtsis dang / bzo dang / rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos dag go //
analyzed: chos dang / rtog ge dang / don dang / sgra dang / gar dang ; ro bcud dang / yongs su brtag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gso ba dang / rtsis dang / bzo dang / rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos dag go //
translated: Treaties on Dharma, logic, meaning, language, dance, taste, examination, desire, medicine, calculation, crafts, and consciousness.

original: bstan bcos la mkhas pa ni 'chos pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos la mkhas pa ni 'chos pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Skilled in treatises means skilled in composition.

original: slar yang slob dpon gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slar yang slob dpon gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Again, to show the characteristics of a master,

original: de nyid bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says the ten realities, and so on.

original: bcu ni rab tu grags pa'i grangs te bgrang ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: bcu ni rab tu grags pa'i grangs te bgrang ba la 'jug go //
translated: Ten is a well-known number, referring to enumeration.

original: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Reality is the nature free from error.

original: de rnams de nyid kyang yin la bcu yang yin pas na bcu'i grangs su 'chad pa'i de nyid dag ni de nyid bcu'o //
